hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: antBuildArgs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Extra arguments for the ant build. For example, `-Dscalac.args=\"-Xcheckinit\"`.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: testExtraArgs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Extra arguments for partest. For example, `-Dpartest.scalac_opts=\"-Xcheckinit\"`.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: testTarget
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Ant test targets to call. The default is 'test.core docs.done'.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: jobsGlob
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Select test script(s) using a Ant-style Glob
